description: DTO to capture the prediction details

operationType.description: The type of the operation (1: is new or has been updated, 2: should be deleted from any client cache)

vehicleId.description: The actual vehicle in transit (for train modes, the leading car of the rolling set)

platformName.description: Platform name (for bus, this is the stop letter)

destinationNaptanId.description: Naptan Identifier for the prediction's destination

timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the prediction was inserted/modified (source column drives what objects are broadcast on each iteration)

timeToStation.description: Prediction of the Time to station in seconds

currentLocation.description: The current location of the vehicle.

towards.description: Routing information or other descriptive text about the path of the vehicle towards the destination

expectedArrival.description: The expected arrival time of the vehicle at the stop/station

timeToLive.description: The expiry time for the prediction

modeName.description: The mode name of the station/line the prediction relates to

timing.description: Keep the original timestamp from MongoDb fo debugging purposes
